resources.string: \t\tRight now, we are experiencing a crisis. To keep you and your family safe, please observe the following.\n

Your hands touch many surfaces throughout the day and this makes them a likely place for germs to stay. To decrease the chances of spreading germs and catching them yourself, practice washing your hands as often as possible.\n
Use soap as it is very effective at killing any unwanted germs. Lather generously with soap and rub all parts of your hands: fingers, palm, back of the hand, fingernails, and more.\n

Keep yourself and your family safe by staying inside your house unless there is a need to buy basic necessities such as food, medicine, and water. Wear mask or protective clothing. Do not stay outdoors for too long and try not to go outside when there are a lot of people.\n

Get the mobile number of your local government unit and/or any barangay officials. Coordinate with them for matters relating to relief good distribution, issuance of quarantine pass, or reporting cases.\n
